tool_description: Publishes volunteer opportunity listings to multiple platforms simultaneously with proper formatting and error handling.

listing_id.description: ID of the volunteer listing to publish

target_platforms.description: Array of platform names to publish to

publish_immediately.description: Whether to publish immediately or save as draft

auto_retry.description: Whether to automatically retry failed publications

notification_email.description: Email address to notify of publication results

error_messages: Invalid listing ID: The provided listing_id does not exist or is not ready for publishing.
No valid platforms: None of the target_platforms have valid credentials or are available.
Publishing failed: Publication failed on all target platforms. Check platform status and credentials.
Partial publishing failure: Publication succeeded on some platforms but failed on others.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address for notification_email.
Platform rate limit exceeded: One or more platforms have rate limited the publishing requests.
usage: Provide listing_id and target_platforms to publish across multiple platforms. Set publish_immediately to false for draft mode. Enable auto_retry for better reliability.

platform_listing_urls.description: URLs of published listings on each platform

total_reach.description: Estimated total audience reach across all platforms
